name: AddOrUpdateGithubCollaborator
description:
Add or update a collaborator on a GitHub repository.

Use this tool to add a new collaborator or update the permission level of an existing collaborator on a GitHub repository. The invitee will receive a notification, and changes are instantly applied. Be aware of rate limits and permissions restrictions.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The GitHub username of the account owner of the repository. This is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository. This input is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: github_user_handle
parameters.description: The GitHub user handle for the collaborator to be added or updated.

value_schema.description: The handle for the GitHub user account.

parameters.name: permission_level_for_github_collaborator
parameters.description: Specify the permission to grant or update for a collaborator on an organization-owned GitHub repository. Only valid for such repositories.

value_schema.description: The permission to grant the collaborator. **Only valid on organization-owned repositories.**

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The handle for the GitHub user account.

value_schema.description: The handle for the GitHub user account.

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description: The permission to grant the collaborator. **Only valid on organization-owned repositories.**

value_schema.description: The permission to grant the collaborator. **Only valid on organization-owned repositories.**

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
